_header: Me liketh ever the longer the bet
Subjects: grace, at meals; Winchester, city of; songs
_description: Grace for a Winchester civic feast — a two-part song, two quatrains (abab)

CULAdd5943.First Lines:
Me lykyþ ever þe lenger þe betby Wyngestyr þat
                    joly cyte…
CULAdd5943.Last Lines:
…þe ryuers rennyt al aboutÞe toun ys ruelyd apon
                    skylle
